ComicInfo.Summary:
The revolution is over and the fate of the Krook people is now in their own hands, but what of the fate of the Deadpool Corps? As they try to escape with their tons of ill-gotten booty, the very fate of the Corps itself is in the balance. The scintillating conclusion to the Space Family Wilson's adventures across the far-flung cosmos.
Note: Inside the issue Matt Yackey is wrongly credited as cover colorist.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 21:44:26. [CVDB267130]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Rob Liefeld, Skottie Young, Thomas Mason
ComicInfo.Characters: Broken Blade, Contemplator, Deadpool, Dogpool, Gardener, Grandmaster, Kidpool, Lady Deadpool, Princess Teela, Zombie Deadpool
ComicInfo.Teams: Deadpool Corps, Elders of the Universe
